text: Suppose n and p are unsigned int variables in a C program. We wish to set p$ to "Cjs. If nis large, which one of the following statements is most likely to set p correctly? Ap=nx(n—1)*(n—2)/6; Bp=nx*x(n—1)/2%(n—2)/3; Cp=nx(n—1)/3x(n—2)/2; D.p=nx(n—1)*(n—2)/6.0; gatecse-2014-set2 programming programming-in-c normal
